Title: Text Page with Illuminated Heading
Description: This folio from Walters manuscript W.552 is a text page containing an illuminated heading in gold ink for chapter 7 (Surat al-a'raf), reading: al-a'raf mi<'>atan wa-khams <a>y<a>t.
Keywords: Abbasid; Binding; Book; Calligraphy; Codex; Illumination; Islamic; Manuscript;  Prayer;  Qur`an; Central Arab Lands (Near East); Kufic; Early Abbasid script
Provenance: Henry Walters, Baltimore [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Creator: Islamic
